attributes.action: Rioters who are not British are not conducive to UK society and should be deported
attributes.additional_details: Peaceful protest is an important part of democracy but rioting is criminal. Rioters who are not British are not conducive to UK society and should be deported. Rioters' spouse and offspring should also be deported, if not British. Rioters should be treated severely and as outcast so that there should be not anymore rioting in the future.
